name: Digital Biology
description: Digital Biology is a Biotechnology Research company dedicated to advancing vaccine and drug development in an effort to benefit those at risk for respiratory infectious diseases.

name: PipeIQ
description: PipeIQ is a rapidly growing generative AI startup, pioneering the creation of autonomous AI agents that aim to revolutionize the marketing and sales industry.

name: Hack at UCI
description: Hack at UCI is a student-run organization established to provide students with a platform to learn, grow, and develop technology.

name: Shi Labs
description: Shi Labs combine biochemical, structural, and high throughput sequencing-based global analyses in research.

name: WordleBot
description: WordleBot is a program designed to accurately guess the daily wordle based on positional frequency.

name: Shareloft
description: Shareloft is a private community and platform for thousands of retail investors, hosted by Tesla analyst and YouTuber Rob Maurer.
